text: Pol irebamɨn mɨn bizir kamɨn ganigha, e zuamɨra bizibar kɨrighava Masedonian mangasa tuavibar kɨri. E foz, God akar aghuim me mɨkɨnasav en dia.(16:10) Buk Aposelɨn akar otevir maba iti, “Eia” iti. Gumazir avɨrim a ghaze, Luk, Pol koma dughiar mabar arui, kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Eia.” Dughiar kam Luk Pol ko ghua Filipain tugha, egha Filipain iti. Bizir kam bagha, Pol Filipai ataghizɨma, akar kam, “eia”, ua itir puvatɨ. Aposel 16:40 an ganigh.
